node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer
node.description: Ocean spray soaks the wooden boards of the pier. Cloaked in shadows, the main dock of the island extends to the west, surrounded by the forms of sleeping ships. The sound of drunken laughter comes from the direction of the wooden ladder that leads to Denison's Pub.

Ocean spray soaks the wooden boards of the pier. Gulls and terns fly above the main dock to the west, their harsh cries mingling with the shouts of bosuns and captains ready to set sail. Sailors walking along the pier glance longingly at the wooden ladder which leads to Denison's Pub.

node.name: Harbor Docks, Aesry Surlaenis'a
node.description: Sturdy oak planks stretch eastward towards the lights of the harbor and the shouting sailors in Denison's Pub. Two beams of light pierce the darkness, emanating from a point high on the island's slope.

Sturdy oak planks stretch eastward, leading to the harbor proper and the trail to the rest of Surlaenis island. Twin points of light beckon from a point high on the island's slope, guiding ships through the dangerous shoals at the harbor's mouth. A small pod of dolphins play a game of tag in the water below.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer
node.description: Weathered by the sun and the salty sea air, the wooden pier stretches to the south. Ships of all types anchor for the night, though some small boats fish near the dangerous shoals at the harbor mouth.

Weathered by the sun and the salty sea air, the wooden pier stretches to the south. Ships of all types anchor near the pier, or sail away with sails billowing in the wind. Several dolphins frolic in the water, leaping over the wakes of passing ships.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer
node.description: A few small boats are anchored away from the pier. The waters below are alive with scores of fish that come to feed off of the trash that is dumped into the harbor each night. The reek of decaying garbage rises from the water.

Several small boats, each with several hundred yards of fishing net tied on deck, are docked to this corner of the pier. A veritable swarm of gulls rest in the water as the fishermen clean their catch. The reek of rotting fish guts rises from the water.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer
node.description: The ale-stained walls and shattered glass windows of Denison's Pub dominate this stretch of the wooden walkway. A dented silver bell hangs above the remains of a bench broken in a brawl. To the west, a wooden ladder leads down to the pier.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer
node.description: A flurry of activity surrounds an elegant black building. The crest of the Traders' Guild is carved into the surface of the white birch doors that lead into the foyer. Across from the building, a wooden ladder leads down to the pier.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer
node.description: Carved white birch columns support the blue tile roof of a prosperous shop on the eastern side of the street. A sign hangs from the shop's tiled awning, painted with the words, Bariyu's Water Supplies. Across from the building, a wooden ladder leads down to the pier.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer
node.description: A dingy shack perches precariously above the ocean waves. Strands of seaweed hang from the front of the shack, drying in the sun. On the far side of the house, a rickety ladder reaches down to the dark sand of the beach.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Lezeni's Cove
node.description: Gentle waves lap against the poles that support the pier and harbor buildings. The salty sea breeze combines with the rhythm of the waves, creating a relaxing, hypnotic sound. Several ropes hang from the shack above into the water beneath the pier.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Above Lezeni's Cove
node.description: A path winds up the cliffs from the sand of the cove, twisting around jutting rocks and shacks anchored into the rocks. The wind whistles sharply through the crevices and the air is sticky with salt.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Above Lezeni's Cove
node.description: A wide shelf in the cliffs is packed with small dwellings, each one close to another, some abandoned, some noisy with the cries and shouts of the inhabitants. The climb up the cliff continues to the southeast.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Above Lezeni's Cove
node.description: A larger dwelling or two cantilevers over the face of the cliffs, no doubt with a nice view of Surlaenis Harbor. As to how sturdy such structures are, however, there is definite question. The wind thrums constantly and blows sand and bits of debris along the path and between the abodes.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Above Lezeni's Cove
node.description: The path levels out as it arcs around a promontory in the cliff. A piece of sailcloth caught in a crack in the rocks whips in the wind like a flag, flapping and moaning with each lash of breeze.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Above Lezeni's Cove
node.description: A hollow in the cliff provides a sheltered area for the collection of dwellings perched upon the level surfaces of the cliff. Like the nests of some cliff-dwelling birds, they huddle together in available spaces on the precipice, some nicely maintained, some in squalid condition.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Above Lezeni's Cove
node.description: A long, sloping path leads up to a higher section of the cliffs and down to the sand and rocks below. A crumbling wood shack, roofless and decaying, barely remains upright in the gusty winds. Prickly cocklebur grasses grow in pockets of sand all along the path.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Near Lezeni's Cove
node.description: Sea oats and cocklebur grasses grow plentifully in the sandy soil. To the southwest, the white wavecaps in the water reflect the light from the flashing beacons of the Sentinels above. Salty wet air and spray blows on the wind from the damp rocky beach below.

Sea oats and cocklebur grasses grow plentifully in the sandy soil. To the southwest, the water sparkles from this higher viewpoint, the sunlight catching on the wavecaps. A rocky beach below is damp and dark from the wet breezes and spray that blow across it.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Near Lezeni's Cove
node.description: A wide, rocky beach, with grass-covered sand dunes to the east, borders the waters near Surlaenis Harbor. The waves crash upon the pebbles, grinding the edges smoother as they scrape against each other. Gulls wheel overhead looking for scraps of food, their keer, keer cry calling forlornly.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Near Lezeni's Cove
node.description: A wide, rocky beach, with grass-covered sand dunes to the east, borders the waters near Surlaenis Harbor. The waves crash upon the pebbles, grinding the edges smoother, the tide leaving seaweed to dry upon the wet rocks.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Near Lezeni's Cove
node.description: Sea oats and cocklebur grasses grow plentifully in the sandy soil. To the southwest, the white wavecaps in the water reflect the light from the flashing beacons of the Sentinels above. Salty wet air and spray blows on the wind from the damp rocky beach below.

Sea oats and cocklebur grasses grow plentifully in the sandy soil. To the southwest, the water sparkles from this higher viewpoint, the sunlight catching on the wavecaps. A rocky beach below is damp and dark from the wet breezes and spray that blow across it.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cove
node.description: The water splashes playfully on the rocky beach, each ebb and flow grinding the stones against each other with a rasping sound. A glint of a fish flashes in the wake of the waves, but quickly darts out of sight. The small rocks shift underfoot as the water continues its constant advance and retreat upon the shore.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cove
node.description: The depth of the water suddenly increases where the rock-littered shelf underfoot ends at a sharp demarcation, and the waves swell and dip before they break to the east. To the south and west the deep water is rougher as it rounds a jutting finger of rock, while the distant docks of Surlaenis rise in the opposite direction.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cove
node.description: The depth of the water suddenly increases where the rock-littered shelf underfoot ends at a sharp demarcation, and the waves swell and dip before they break to the east. To the south and west the deep water is rougher as it rounds a jutting finger of rock, while the distant docks of Surlaenis rise in the opposite direction.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer
node.description: Redolent with the salty scent of the sea, a fickle breeze ruffles the pennants hanging before the offices of affluent trading consortiums. The wooden boards of the walkway are cool after the day's heat. Shouts of sailors reveling in a night's shore leave come from the west.

Redolent with the salty scent of the sea, a fickle breeze ruffles the pennants hanging before the offices of affluent trading consortiums. The wooden boards of the walkway are warm with the day's heat. Shouts of sailors unloading cargo and preparing for a night's shore leave come from the west.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer
node.description: Salt-stained wooden boards echo with each traveller's footsteps. Houses of black oak are supported by platforms made of sturdy ironwood, each with an entire tree trunk driven into the sand below. The walkway stretches westward to the pier, and east to ascend the outer slope of the island.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Strong smells of tar and ocean air waft on the wind coming from the harbor to the west. Vast expanses of white sand lie to the north and south, split in two by a wooden walkway rising up the slope of the island.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Open Yard
node.description: The grass-covered sand dunes piled at the base of the rocky sea cliff have been smoothed and flattened into a broad yard. Hoofprints of all sizes crisscross the area around a grey-boarded barn and a low stable tucked against the base of the rocks.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Winding Track
node.description: A well-beaten track winds among the dunes, with a variety of jumps and obstacles placed at intervals along its landward side to create an exercise area. Fences, a wooden gate, and a brick-painted wall provide jumping challenges, while a blue barrel and a red barrel mark the ends of the course.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Among the Dunes
node.description: To the north, the dark bulk of the rocky sea cliff juts into the ocean, cutting off the palely glimmering expanse of sand and creating a semi-sheltered area where driftwood has accumulated from long-forgotten storms. Against the cliffs, a broad area has been cleared and jousting lists built from the flatter planks that have been washed up.

To the north, the rocky sea cliff juts into the ocean, cutting off the expanse of sand and creating a semi-sheltered area where driftwood has accumulated from long-forgotten storms. Against the cliffs, a broad area has been cleared and jousting lists built from the flatter planks that have been washed up.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff Path
node.description: The narrow trail claws its way up from the harbor area and wends a long distance along the rocky breadth of the sea cliff. The rim of Aesry Surlaenis'a looms high above, its massive weight seemingly impervious to the force of the sea beating against its foundation in a frothy rage.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff Path
node.description: A small patch of crimson wildflowers has managed to take root where the trail merges into a slim ledge. Bright heads nodding in the breeze, they provide a lively contrast to the stark rock and dizzying height.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff Path
node.description: Relentless in her onslaught, the sea has found a foothold and worn away at the very bones of the island, leaving the trail undercut and hanging far out over the restless waves. Looking down, it's as if the trail floats upon the surface of the water and the blue-green roil is mesmerizing to behold.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff Path
node.description: The surface of the promontory is crazed as if slammed by a god's fist. A web of cracks, thread-thin to foot-wide, spreads in all directions and the trail has eroded to mere inches in width making traversing it a hazard. A constant sprinkling of dust rains down from the stressed basalt.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff Path
node.description: Running jaggedly from northeast to southwest, a massive fissure has cleaved the face of the rock like an old battle scar. A warm damp breeze wheezes forth from the darkness, and faintly, the steady drip, drip of falling water can be heard from deep inside the stone.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff Path
node.description: The winding trail, after one last twist and turn, abruptly ends its sojourn at the edge of an outcrop. Small stunted bushes huddle together around the edge of the formation and rattle their branches at each intrusion of the wind. Far below, a wave-swept cove lies in the lee of the surrounding promontories and a thin switchback trail hacked into the stone leads downwards.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cove
node.description: The cool sea laps gently at the sands of the small cove as it settles beneath the cloak of night. Tiny luminous sea creatures drift slowly in scattered tide pools, unconsciously imitating the glory of a starry sky, while feeding the misshapen bodies of the sand crabs that live amongst them.

A crescent of warm black sand nestles at the base of the trail, softening the harsh lines of the towering escarpments. The sea sends forth restless tendrils of aquamarine to wash at the sands, leaving behind foam-flecked reminders of its relentless energy. Far overhead, a lone cypress clings stubbornly to the rock casting its cool shadow over a tangle of driftwood and debris.

node.name: Sea Caves, Tunnel
node.description: Cool wind blows in from the sea and down into the tunnel. Flecks of mica glitter in the walls, floor, and ceiling of the basalt passageway. Green moss grows tentatively across the ground and partway up the sides of the tunnel where the late rays of sunlight fall before the sun goes to its rest. The sound of the pounding surf echoes faintly down the hall.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: To the west, the wooden walkway slopes downward to the dark wooden buildings of the harbor. As it rises to the east, it follows the natural contours of the island, leading to a dark stone cleft far above.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: The salt-stained boards of the wooden walkway lead west from the base of a long stone ramp. Gritty sand fills the spaces between the planks, blown by the wind from the far reaches of the island.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Sparse shoots of grass struggle to grow in the sandy soil where the beach ends and the rest of the island begins. A large stone ramp leads down to the beach, its surface slick with spray from the ocean. The dark wooden buildings of the harbor rise to the west, breaking the clean line of the sands.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: The grass alongside the dirt path is well-nibbled by the wild sheep which roam in the grassy fields. A strong breeze, redolent with the scent of ocean air, rustles through the grass.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Lush green hills surround the dirt road. Delicate wildflowers dot the fields, their brilliant colors contrasting with the emerald grass. Blades of grass bow in homage before the fickle breeze
Lush green hills surround the dirt road. Delicate wildflowers dot the fields, their brilliant colors contrasting with the emerald grass. Blades of grass bow in homage before the fickle breeze.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Rising abruptly from the emerald grass is a cliff of dark basalt stone. The dirt road ends at the base of a long switchback trail. In the distance, tall waves lap against the white sand beach, their white foam gleaming in the light.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: A long switchback trail leads down a cliff of dark basalt stone. To the northeast, a dense forest of silverwood and white birch stretches up the mountain's slope to the snowline far above.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: The basalt road runs precariously alongside a steep drop, climbing upwards towards a dense forest. Emerald green grass carpets the rolling hills below.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Wide gaps between trees here at the forest's edge reveal the sparkling blue ocean below. A basalt road leads downward, while a thin dirt path continues east into the trees.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: White flowers grow in a small clearing away from the path. One of the few varieties that bloom year round, the geshiloira petals are the exact color of winter snow.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Silverwood bark gleams in the faint light shining through the branches above. A fallen branch, its surface covered in red-capped mushrooms, rests beside a narrow trail.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Wafting on the air from beneath the trees is the aroma of decaying plants. The rich brown earth of the forest is renewed each year by the falling leaves of the trees. A narrow trail curves downward towards the beach.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Gleaming silverwood mingles with white birch beside the path, the more fragile trees vying with their hardier cousins for the light. A rocky trail to the east leads upward, towards the cleft in the mountain wall.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Black velvet shadows fill the gaps between tree trunks. The dirt path curves eastward from the rocky trail which leads downward. Mournful hoots of hunting owls echo through the darkness.
Black velvet shadows fill the gaps between tree trunks. The dirt path curves eastward from the rocky trail which leads downward. Faint birdsong fills the shadows.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Dark green forest closes around the wide dirt path, the trunks of the trees partially blocking the view of the mountain pass to the north. The trees thicken to the south and west, creating a tunnel of shadows.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Dark basalt towers above, the natural walls of the selhin dava rising several thousand feet above the path. Brilliant white light shines from the Twin Sentinels of Aesry Surlaenis'a, guarding either side of the pass. A narrow dirt path runs through the pass.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Selhin Dava
node.description: Shadow and light paint a tapestry on the leaves of the forest below. White birch mingles with silverwood, providing glimpses of color among the green. Far below, the deep blue ocean waves caress the white sands of the beach surrounding the island. Disrupting the natural line of the beach, the dark wood of the harbor juts into the sea at the end of Shadaer Jama.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Selhin Dava
node.description: A tall basalt wall blocks the path eastwards, where the dip in the terrain creates a natural pass. A great iron-reinforced gate, or Selhin Ilga, is the entrance through the wall, and is carefully guarded by specially trained soldiers to ensure no enemies breach the inner domain of Surlaenis.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Selhin Ilga
node.description: Here between the inner and outer gates of the great wall, the sun rarely shines. The huge wall towers twenty feet overhead and is equally thick. The cool damp stone echoes with the sounds of travelers, as the guards that man Selhin Ilga pace atop the wall, ready for any disturbance.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Selhin Dava
node.description: The great inner gate, or ilga, and the huge basalt wall of the Selhin Dava protect the city from any unwelcome outsiders. Sharp winds blow through the pass and gust over the birch woods that flourish to the east. Here within the shadow of the wall, travelers check their equipment before journeying on to the city proper. A pair of stone stairs hewn into the rock mirror each other as they climb to the south and north, leading to the top of the wall.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Selhin Dava
node.description: Spread below to the east is a view of the whole of inner Surlaenis. The bowl-shaped interior of the island slopes back down to a mist-mantled blue lake, with a smaller island floating in its midst. The city surrounds this lough and looks like a miniature model from this height. The northern quadrant of the island is a steep rocky incline, while the southern slopes are greener and more lush with forest and meadowland. Opposite, to the east, is a heavily forested slope, covered with dense dark trees.

Spread below to the east is the dark basin of the interior reaches of Surlaenis. A single misty light glows eternally in the center of the dark lake at the base of the inner slopes, surrounded by lights from the encircling streets and buildings winking far below.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Sound softens beneath the birch trees due to the thick mulch of old leaves that blankets the ground. Small cones hang from the weeping side branches of the graceful trees, dripping moisture from their tips. Split logs reinforce the earthen steps that climb up to the crown of the pass.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Young birch woods line the upper slopes as the harbor road approaches the crest of Selhin Dava. A few dry leaves scutter across the packed surface of the road and tumble with every breeze on the slopes beneath the trees.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Birches border the road, their slender twiggy branches arching overhead and patterning the view of the sky. Their attenuated trunks stand pale against the dark soil until they disappear into a shadowy blur in the distance.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Wooden timbers reinforce the packed earthen stairs cut into the hillside. The road's descent is steeper and longer than usual, and this group of steps has a smooth, polished handrailing for the weary to cling to and catch a breath. The heathered slopes meet birch woods here, the eastern lower inclines covered with scrub and grasses, the birch climbing the higher terraces to the pass.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Birch Path
node.description: The narrow path threads its way among the birches, with the steep slant of the hillside banking the western edge. Young birches nevertheless manage to cling to the near vertical slope. The rustle of leaves and twigs is constant as the drooping branches move with the slightest disturbance in the air.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Birch Path
node.description: The ground is soft underfoot. Birch trees spread in all directions, their silvery-grey leaves whispering the language of trees in a soothing rustle. Spots of greenish moss grow on some of the thicker trunks.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Birch Path
node.description: The trees cluster so densely that it is difficult to be certain of the path. One larger tree, with blackish-grey bark, stands like a mother to her smaller children, her crown well above the rest of the wood. Fluttering leaves and flickering shadows dance in constant motion.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, End of Path
node.description: The path comes to an abrupt end at the top of a steep bank. The tops of birch trees fill the view below and to the southeast, and tendrils of a dense mist float amongst the growth. The bank of the dropoff is crumbling dirt, covered with many seasons' fallen leaves. Each footfall rattles the dead foliage underfoot, loudly jarring the suddenly noticeable quiet.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Lower Birch Wood
node.description: A leaf-covered hillside leads up to the west. Some partially uprooted birches lean down the sharp incline -- many broken and dead branches prop one tree at a near horizonal angle. To the east, smaller stunted trees with a green-grey moss coating the bark overlap their boughs to form a net of branches. A faint, green-tinged mist creeps silently throughout.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Lower Birch Wood
node.description: Every tree within sight is splattered with a greenish-grey moss, a clinging growth that looks more like a disease than a co-habitant. The leaves covering the ground are crusted with the same stringy substance, which perhaps emerges from the ground to grow up the trunks of the trees. The branches are still as the fog twines about them, and the familar rustling of their twigs and leaves is absent.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Lower Birch Wood
node.description: Heart-shaped, dark green leathery leaves of wild ginger grow in a sweeping arc over the ground. The spicy fragrance fills the air with a wet, warm odor. Moss hangs from the birch branches in twisted strands like locks of hair. Sounds still suddenly, except for a sourceless, arrhythmic dripping sound.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Lower Birch Wood
node.description: Five mature birches grew and died here -- nothing stands now but their skeletons, thoroughly coated in the moss. An unpleasant green-tinted mist fills the air, as a steamy vapor evaporates from the mossy surfaces. Brittle broken twigs thatch the soggy ground.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Lower Birch Wood
node.description: The wall of the hillside blocks the view west. Small saplings grow along it except near a dark vertical gash. Sathramoss covers most of the hole, and in one more season, will completely cloak it. A vaporous mist hovers about the moss, forming along its edges.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Lower Birch Wood
node.description: A dress woven of grass and leaves hangs caught on a broken branch, as if someone had left it behind in a desperate escape. The ground is very boggy here, and footprints fill quickly with green water. Sound is deadened by the birch growth, voices muffled by the heavy misty air.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Lower Birch Wood
node.description: A dip in the terrain houses a shelter where the infrangible barrier of trees prevents further movement into the wood. Beneath a canopy of tangled boughs hangs a hammock, woven from the living branches of two white-barked birches. Although the moss spreads over the ground like embroidery, the trees here are as yet untouched by the blight. The mist is thinner, but lingers heavily within the surrounding forest.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Wooden timbers reinforce the packed earthen stairs cut into the hillside. The high stair climb may have created the need for the wooden handrail which gives the weary a place to cling to and catch a breath. A line of birch trees grows up the western slopes as the heathery moorland yields to the slender shapes of silvery forest.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: A burbling sound betrays the presence of running water somewhere nearby. Patches of heather and surlaenis knotweed conceal any springs or small streams that might be the source, but lusher growth does clump around a gouged indentation in the hillside.
A burbling sound betrays the presence of running water somewhere nearby. The dark and the overgrowth of heather conceal any springs or small streams that might be the source.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: A whiff of a sour scent drifts from somewhere nearby. Scraggly groups of wild plum trees just to the north of the road are the tallest trees in the rather moor-like terrain. The hard packed surface of the dirt road continues up and down the slope in a straight east-west direction.

A whiff of a sour scent drifts from somewhere nearby. Scraggly groups of trees to the north are silhouetted against the night sky. The dirt packed surface of the harbor road continues up and down the slope in a straight east-west direction.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: The chirring of hidden insects vibrates within the tall wild grasses and low shrubs that border the road. Dark rocks emerge above the heath and jut out erratically from the steeply sloping ground. An occasional black-brown rabbit streaks over the gabbro boulders before diving safely out of sight into the rough terrain.
The chirring of hidden insects vibrates within the tall wild grasses and low shrubs that border the road. Dark shapes emerge above the heath and jut out erratically from the steeply sloping ground.
The chirring of hidden insects vibrates within the tall wild grasses and low shrubs that border the road. Dark shapes emerge above the heath and jut out erratically from the steeply sloping ground.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Approximately halfway between Selhin Dava and the shore of Cha'walkas, the road widens to a circular, level area enclaved by heather and tall grass. Many travelers use this point as a resting place, if not a spot to survey the surrounding view.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: This section of the road is paved with the bedrock of a stone outcropping. The stairs are solid rock, and hewn from the same granite vein. Each broad step is smoothly cut, but undulating lines like abstract ocean waves decorate each tread. A single jutting boulder walls off a portion of the view to the north, and its flat facing surface is decorated with the abstract carving of a dragon-like monster.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: This section of the road is paved with the bedrock of a stone outcropping. The stairs are solid rock, and hewn from the same granite vein. Each broad step is smoothly cut, but undulating lines like abstract ocean waves decorate each tread. Some tangling blackberry brambles cover the hillside slopes on both sides of the road.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: The road slopes gently at an angle down to the east before pausing at the brink of another set of stairs cut into the hillside. Off to the south, farmland fields lie in curving narrow strips, some fallow, some planted, in a rhythmic rotation of life and rest.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Some large granite stones protrude from the packed dirt surface of the road, aligned like the vertebrae of an animal crouching beneath the soil. The bulges aren't great enough to trip a traveler, but resound like cobblestones when trod upon. Knee-high grasses wave along the sides of the road, the cultivated fields to the north deteriorating to the rockier slopes covered with more of the tall wild grasses.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: Dark granite stone reinforces the steep stairs cut into the hillside. A group of birch trees shelters this section of dirt road. Given the constant twittering and rattling branches, the cluster of trees is a popular perch for local songbirds which dart in and out of the branches.
Dark granite stone reinforces the steep stairs cut into the hillside. A group of birch trees shelters this section of dirt road, their branches reaching upwards towards the night sky.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: The moderately sloping trail from the east ends abruptly at an earthen and stone stairway carved from the hillside which leads up towards the pass. Low hedges of dark green shrubs divide the bordering fields into protected terraces, creating a crazy-quilt of farms.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Shadaer Jama
node.description: The hard, packed surface of the road which leads up over the pass to the west begins its climb here. Eluned's prayer gate lies a short distance further east. Tilled fields border either side of the road, the air fragrant with rich soil and cultivated vegetation.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Eluned Prayer Gate
node.description: Gentle terraces of tilled earth rise to the west, leading towards the Selhin Dava. A large prayer gate, watched over by two guards, stands as the only demarcation between the inner slope and the city. Dedicated to Eluned of the Waters, the prayer gate bears an anloral sculpture of a leaping dolphin at its peak.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Beneath the Prayer Gate
node.description: Smooth mother-of-pearl walls rise to form a gentle arch above. Mosaics of interlocking shells form images of life beneath Elanthia's oceans. Blue-grey dolphins frolic among sea-green waves as gentle merfolk herd schools of fish into nets of woven kelp. To the east, the Staho Pivo'hrr'schu'Mus leads into the city proper.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: The trees begin to thin as the trail climbs at a steep angle up the mountainside. Young stands of fir and modwir crowd the slender birch trees as both compete on the rocky soil. Winding through the dark tree trunks, the path is cushioned by a layer of decaying reddish-brown pine needles.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: Slender shapes seem to dart from shadow to shadow beneath the sheltering branches of the trees, only to vanish before you can turn your head. The dark wood and leaves are surprisingly healthy, given the altitude and the cold.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: Thin strands of milkweed drift past, lofted from a bird's nest by an errant breeze. The path branches here to the north and west, making its way around the impenetrable tangle of briars which form a nearby thicket. A hole, half-hidden at the base of the brambles, emits the pungent, musky scent of a badger or skunk.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: Branches tangle overhead, caught by tendrils of ivy that mingle with the brambles in a nearby briar patch. The thicket is home to a variety of wildlife -- chittering squirrels, shy rabbits and raucous crows are but a few of the more easily identified residents.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: The path ends at the top of a dropoff, leaving no choice but to turn back the way you came. The ocean is visible to the south -- sparkling blue water capped by white foam as the waves crest and roll toward the shore. A pod of dolphins leaps into the air, racing before the prow of a ship just entering the island's western harbor.

The path ends at the top of a dropoff, leaving no choice but to turn back the way you came. The ocean is visible to the south -- sparkling moonlit water capped by white foam as the waves crest and roll toward the shore.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: Leaves rustle softly as some unseen animal stalks within the thicket. Evidently the creature poses little threat to the denizens of the briars, as birds' songs continue, unabated by the disturbance. A faint musky scent wafts through the air.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: The air is cool beneath the overhanging branches of the modwir trees that line the path. Soft green moss clings to tree trunks, and the fragrance of leaf mold mingles with the sharp scent of fir needles.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: A flash of red disappears into the darkness as a cardinal darts down to land in the nearby thicket. Deep green vines bearing dark purple berries twine among the brambles, lending a splash of color against the thorny brown backdrop.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: Dark grey tufts of matted fur dangle from the branches of a briar patch, pulled from the pelt of a wolf or other creature. Sunlight filters through the leaves to paint the ground with shifting shades of green.

Moonlight filters through the leaves, illuminating tufts of dark grey fur caught on the thorns of a nearby briar patch. Deep within the tangled underbrush, unilluminated by the pallid light of the moons, leaves rustle and branches break with a sharp *snap* as some unseen creature makes its way, padding softly through the thicket.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: Half-hidden beneath fallen pine needles, a patch of dried mud captures the paw prints of some large animal. The wind blows strongly on the mountainside, carrying with it the scent of pine needles intermingled with the sharper musky scent of a fox den.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: A rustling cushion of dried leaves covers the path as it skirts a small pond. Runoff from the snow fields high atop the mountain trickles down the cliff face on the far side of the pond, and collects here, leaving the water icy-cold on even the warmest summer days.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: A boulder juts up through the ground cover, the surface dappled with darker pockets where erosion has worn away the basalt. Tiny peridot chips embedded in the rock sparkle as the light refracts through the crystals.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: Twisted roots stretch across the path, catching the feet of unwary hunters as they pass beneath the shelter of the modwir trees that line the trail. A spider industriously spins her web from tree branch to trunk, the pale grey strands glistening in the light.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: The path comes to an abrupt end at the base of a tall cliff. Gnarled roots and crevices mark the surface, providing purchase for the agile to scramble up the slope. Narrow rivulets of frigid water trickle down the cliff face from the snow fields above, collecting in a nearby pond.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Falachui Ikeme
node.description: Stunted modwirs cling with gnarled roots to the thin patches of dirt that nestle between the rocky outcroppings beside the path. The wind is chill, cutting through layers of clothing and armor alike.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chedirnan
node.description: The deep, still water of the pool reflects the sky and the surrounding trees with crystal clarity, disturbed only along the cliff edge where multiple tiny waterfalls eddy the surface. Huge boulders that have separated from the cliff face lie scattered here and there, surrounded by rhododendron and ferns. Behind one immense block that fell within inches of the cliff face, a rough stairway leads upward in a narrow gap.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: Snow covers the rocky ground at the highest reaches of the island, nestling in the angular hollows between jagged basalt stones. The trade road leading to the city of Aesry Surlaenis'a winds around the mountainside about a thousand feet below. Rivulets of frigid water trickle over the side of the cliff, falling into a pond far, far below.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: Gusts of wind dance between the jagged rocks strewn across the mountainside. Rivulets of ice mingle with lighter trachytic flows, winding against the dark basalt backdrop like an eternally frozen river. While it would be a difficult climb, it might be possible to scramble up the ice to the trail above.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: Olivine deposits form dull green streaks through a dark basalt boulder on the upper side of the trail. Though cold now, once this area must have burned with the volcano's fiery rage.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: Snowdrops bloom between the rocks which line a sheltered hollow along the trail. When open, the pale blue, almost white, petals reveal the flower's crimson heart.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: A cold wind howls along the stark rocks of the trail, chilling the body as it depresses the spirits. Local legend holds that the spirits of animals slain by the volcano still roam the hillsides, unaware of their demise.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: The skeleton of a horse or other large animal lies in a tumbled heap a short way down the slope. One leg is obviously broken, and the iron head and curved brass flights of a crossbow bolt are visible nearby. The bones gleam whitely, picked clean by the scavengers who roam the mountainside, ever hungry for their next meal.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: Icy tendrils of mist sway along the snow-covered surface of the mountainside. High above the treeline, the wind blows cold and strong, making the already low temperature seem even worse and lending credibility to the S'Kra Mur notion of hell as a place of ice and frost.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: Frozen rivulets of ice tumble over the side of the mountain, reflecting the sunlight in a spectacular display. The rocky trail is slick underfoot, making travel hazardous. It might be possible to scramble down the ice to the trail below, but the climb would almost certainly be treacherous.

Frozen rivulets of ice tumble over the side of the mountain, reflecting the moonlight with a soft glow. The rocky trail is slick underfoot, making travel hazardous. It might be possible to scramble down the ice to the trail below, but the climb would almost certainly be treacherous.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: Beneath the shelter of an overhanging rock, an irregular circle of blackened rocks outlines the charred remains of a long-extinguished campfire. Outside, the wind whistles about the area in a disconsolate howl, as if bemoaning the loss of its victims.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: Glassy bands of obsidian streak the surface of the mountainside, reflecting the light with a painful glare. Gusts of wind drive the snow before them, forming deep drifts that nestle in the hollows between the rocks.

Glassy bands of obsidian reflect moonlight, shining softly as if Katamba bathed the mountainside in its eerie dark glow. Gusts of wind drive the snow before them, forming deep drifts that nestle in the hollows between the rocks.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: Icy spears dangle from a rocky overhang, the arm-thick icicles catching at hair and clothing of careless travelers. Pale grey fragments of ash crunch underfoot, providing a bit of traction on the treacherous surface of the path.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: Bundles of wood and kindling tied with string are stacked outside the burnt-out shell of a waystation high on the mountainside. No trees grow nearby, so all wood must be carted up the trail from the forests below, a laborious process required to keep the station stocked for emergencies. A faint scent of smoke lingers in the air from the charred timbers.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: Far below, the warm waters of the ocean glisten in the sunlight. Ships' sails billow in the breeze as they skip across the surface of the harbor. The same wind, at this altitude, chills the traveler to the bone. The sunlight that warms the waters below seems merely to accentuate the cold.

Far below, the warm waters of the ocean glisten in the moonlight. Ships' sails billow in the breeze as they skip across the surface of the harbor. The same wind, at this altitude, chills the traveler to the bone.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: A faint mist hovers over the ice and snow, swirling about in an uneasy dance. Rounded boulders, smoothed by exposure to the elements, are scattered across the snowfield like a child's discarded marbles. Swirls of olivine streak the glossy black surfaces, heightening the impression.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: Snow drifts down from an overhanging ledge about fifty feet above. Travelers must move quietly to avoid vibrations that might trigger an avalanche. Further up the trail you can see the outline of a cabin.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: The path slopes sharply upward as it nears the end, reaching the summit after a strenuous scramble over the rock-strewn trail. Gusts of wind further unbalance those who attempt to make their way, howling about to catch at clothing and hair impartially.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshi'selhin Chui
node.description: The trail ends at a rocky promontory on the rim of the mountain. From this point, balanced on a ledge about twenty paces across, there is a view of both the ocean at the base of the mountain, and the town nestled in the crater. A cabin stands here, providing shelter for the guards who maintain the watch, and a signal fire beside it stands ready to be lit to warn the town of the approach of invaders from the sea.

node.name: Mountain Cabin
node.description: Mud and moss chink the gaps between the logs in the cabin's walls, and colorful woolen blankets are hung along the interior to further reduce the drafts. A sturdy wooden table is placed over a trap door in the floor beside the brick hearth.

node.name: Mountain Cabin, Cold Cellar
node.description: Dried hams and sausages hang from the rafters of the cold cellar, safely out of reach of rodents. Along the walls, metal-lined wooden bins filled with sand hold carrots, potatoes, apples and pears, while other bins hold various grains. Wax-sealed terra cotta urns filled with oil rest within a sand-filled pit, cushioned against breakage.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Amakra
node.description: Atop the boulder, a narrow ledge climbs the cliff face upward. Tiny yellow flowers sprout from cracks in the sheer rock, clinging tenaciously in any tiny bit of soil that accumulates.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Amakra
node.description: The ledge widens slightly, creating a resting spot and a high vantage point. To one side, a very steep slope formed of tumbled gravel forms a precarious path upward. Far in the distance, tiny ships and fishing boats move in and out of the harbor, their crews too far off to make out.

The ledge widens slightly, creating a resting spot and a high vantage point. To one side, a very steep slope formed of tumbled gravel forms a precarious path upward. Far in the distance, tiny golden lights glide on the shimmering black expanse of ocean, creating streaks of brightness on the night-lit water.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Bu'amakra
node.description: The slope ends abruptly at a wall of dirty grey that breathes cold even more intense than the thin chill air. Faintly visible under the streaks of grit is a hint of pristine white. An occasional loud cracking sound bears witness to the ponderous, imperceptible movement of the glacial ice.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: The interior of the underground compartment is slick with ice crystals and powdery frost. Cold air wafts from deeper within the small space, seeping through unseen cracks and a larger crevice. Oddly, the back of the cavern seems no darker than the front.

The interior of the underground compartment is slick with ice crystals and powdery frost. Cold air wafts from deeper within the small space, seeping through unseen cracks. Oddly, the back of the cavern seems no darker than the front.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: Huge boulders and bands of jumbled rock hang suspended in solid blue-green ice. Sharp slices of frigid air cut with every breath, and in the pale light, clouds of foggy mist churn as warm air collides with the cold. The floor of the passageway is crisp with tiny snow-like particles, collected as condensation froze and fell.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: A deep gash cuts across the floor of the passageway -- a misstep would plunge the hapless wanderer to immeasurable depths and a hopeless doom. Chunks of fallen boulders, all coated in powdery frost, create an obstacle course requiring careful navigation.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: The long, narrow tunnel snakes deeper into the glacier, the low ceiling requiring all except the shortest races to bend to avoid protrusions of ice flow hanging from the ceiling. Ice so cold that touching it sucks the very strength from the living threatens to entomb any attempting this journey -- only sheer will prevails.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: The narrow passage to the south opens out into a large echoing cavern, with icy walls soaring into darkness. The soft brushing sound is that of falling particles of frozen mist -- it whispers as it touches the floor, the chunks of fallen rock, or your face.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: The dimensions of the cavern are hard to judge, as the walls soar into darkness. Softly whispering frozen mist continues to fall from the air, coating everything it touches with a fine, white powder. The floor slopes at a sharp angle to the north.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: Near the northern end of the cavern, the walls and floor converge to form an alcove. A vertical crevice, barely wide enough to squeeze through, leads deeper into the rock. Overhead, icicles hang like pointy teeth in a gaping maw, glistening hungrily and shedding a glowing blue-green light through the massive layers of ice.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: This high chamber appears to be carved out of solid ice. Icicles of tremendous proportions hang overhead like stalactites from a dim, invisible ceiling. Cubical chunks tumble about the floor and emerge from the wall, stuck fast. Although the cold air penetrates all, closer examination reveals the crystalline structure is not frozen water, but clear quartz-like rocks that will never thaw even should the cold be banished.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: Ice-clear rock lines the winding passageway that slopes deeper into the mountainside, allowing light from the surface to filter through and dimly illuminate all. Northwards, warmer air brushes through, a sweet scented air that speaks of hope. The floor is still slick underfoot with a sheet of ice.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: A webbing of dripping spun-ice bars the passageway. The barrier appears to melt and reform as tendrils creep from the floor and walls to join, and then dissolve into a dripping puddle. Warm air seeps past it, though a frigid wind sails through the turns of the corridor to the south.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: The cold of the void, a cold no life could survive for long, fills the tunnel. Bits of crystal glint where light touches them, the hard cold rock speaking of the unforgiving state of eternal winter.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: The cold blue-green glow filtering through the mass of ice and tumbled rock casts a weird dead light on everything it touches. No sound echoes -- the very vibrations freeze as if in the void.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: A thud of sound thrums through the rock walls, the purpose and rhythm mysterious. From time to time, a swirl of air picks up the frozen particles littering the floor and spins them about in a small tornado storm.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: A cathedral of ice rises around you, the ceiling lost in shadowy darkness. The floor is smooth and slick underfoot, like polished marble. Large sections of the side walls have peeled off under the enormous pressure, and an occasional echoing crack bears testimony to the slow movement of the ice.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: The cavern narrows slightly, with the floor ankle deep in piles of dry, powdery ice crystals. Its walls, frosted like the sides of a cake, round and swell with the swirling formations of rime. Light bounces off the tiny granules to sparkle like distant stars or diamond fragments.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: Deep inside the cavern, only blue light filters in through the frozen ice mass. The corners and niches are a deep, pure indigo, shading almost to azure on the more exposed surface of a pile of ice crystals.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: A skeleton of white bones hangs caught on a shelf of rock above. Coated in a light dusting of icy powder, it is fast becoming one with the bitter cold frost and rock that surrounds all. Drifts of brittle ice particles hug the base of the walls.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: A waterfall once fell through a crack in the rock overhead, but is now frozen in frothy turmoil into a solid chunk of hard glacial ice. Only the imagination can recall the roar of sound such a torrent would have made as it flowed. Underfoot, ice smooth as a mirror levels the floor.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: Smooth, slick ice lines the walls of the small cavern, and the air seems dead and lifeless. Buried deep within the glacier, only a narrow passageway leads out to the east.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: Within the cold ice cave, strange swirls and angular cuts sliced into the glassy walls speak an indecipherable tale. Piles of ice-dust glimmer like anthills of diamond slivers, curiously scattered about the chamber.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: A ridge of packed ice creates a slippery slope to traverse. Small holes bored into the frozen material emit a nasty-smelling odor, exhaling tendrils of smoky fog that freeze to tiny crystalized grains.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: Crystalline stalactites of purest ice hang from the ceiling in fang-like rows. The dim blue light casts weird shadows and creates an alien landscape where nothing appears as it did on the surface under the sun and moons.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: This deep within the glacier, the light dims and shadows fill all corners and crevices. Tiny ice particles swirl in the soft breezes created by any movement, creating the shapes of creatures flickering in the darkness, gone before one can put a name or fear to them.

node.name: Lybadel, Main Deck
node.description: In the middle of the ship, the main deck is closest to the water of all the open decks, and on a hard heel the waves can wash over the exposed planks. For this reason, everything is securely fastened down to keep it from sliding or being washed away, and the hatches are tightly dogged shut. Forward lies the forecastle and an oak door leading to the galley, while aft rises the quarterdeck and under it, a cabin door.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cove
node.description: The farther from shore, the rougher the surf. Huge swells of saltwater sweep any flotsam great distances in a flash, all adrift in ceaseless motion.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cove
node.description: Though hardly calm, the cove is still sheltered and the waves gentle enough to avoid the dangers of a lonely death, dashed against the rocks. The water is very deep, the bottom unseen in the dark below. Upon its surface, the swells set all afloat drifting.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: Tunneling through walls of ice, this passageway slopes downwards to the southwest. The colorless, hard surrounding surfaces show no sign of mortal passage, and no sign of thaw.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Geshiger
node.description: A vertical tunnel of ice penetrates into the dark below. What appears to be a plant, slicked with ice, protrudes from a small ledge on one side, the leaves coated and preserved with a sheeting of glassy frost.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, West of Cove
node.description: Beyond the gentler swells of the cove, the waters grow rough and cold as the northern ocean current curls around Surlaenis. The angle of the island's ascent is apparent from this distance, its conical shape recalling a long dead volcano.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, West of Cove
node.description: Boats traveling the Reshal sea shift upon the swells, rising and falling from view as they enter the distant harbor. Closer by, harbor seals bark from the rocky shores of a narrow inlet to the southeast.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Inlet
node.description: The inlet narrows to a finger as it slices towards the shore. The sea pounds against a rocky promontory to the south, but the waves look less perilous closer to land.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Inlet
node.description: The water is deep and cold, the currents swift. A dangerous rock cliff cuts the inlet off from the rest of the open sea, but does little to shelter it from the rough seas.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Inlet
node.description: The waves slosh against the rocks with salty spray ever present in the air. The large sheer cliff cuts off the view to the south and is uninhabitable except by the seabirds that fly in sweeping curves to nest there. A boulder on the slope of the island is within reach, however.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Underwater
node.description: Salt water churns all about as the sea drives against the submerged rocks. Strands of seaweed caught in the cracks swirl in a fantastical dance as the motion surges and retreats. Below is only dark, deep water.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff Boulder
node.description: This large boulder rises above the spray and slosh from the waves of the cove below and forms the first step up a severe climb along the island's western edge. The frothing waves beat upon the wet rocks emerging from the sea water with a constant thrumming and roar.

This large boulder rises above the spray and slosh of the waves from the cove below and forms the first step up a severe climb along the island's western edge. The frothing waves beat upon the wet rocks emerging from the sea water with a constant thrumming and roar, but the light glints off the wave caps with a sparkle and wink.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff
node.description: A ledge runs along the face of the cliff, rising upwards to the south. Salty wind presses the shrubs clinging to patches of soil against the vertical face, but the ledge is wide enough to traverse safely.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff
node.description: The ledge is wide enough to make the shuddering sea breeze less risky, but cracks in the rock squeal in torment every time a harsh gust blows across. A passage upwards leads safely away from the pounding waves below.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff
node.description: A gouge in the cliff overhead looks like a difficult climb. Trees and shrubs trail down the side of the palisade from the wooded growth there -- quite a pleasant spot if one can attain the heights. Below, the ocean waves thunder on the partly-submerged rocks.

A gouge in the cliff overhead looks like a difficult climb. Trees and shrubs trail down the side of the palisade from the wooded growth there -- quite a pleasant spot if one can attain the heights. Below, the ocean waves flicker with white caps as flecks of foam cling to the partly-submerged rocks.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Cliff
node.description: This area gouged in the cliff is abundant with trees and vegetation, beginning a long curving path into a forest. A flat, barren patch of stone hangs over the cliff face like a diving platform -- one for the fearless or insane.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Wooded Path
node.description: Birch, rowan and willow trees cover the slope upwards to the east. The soil is rich, almost black, wherever the leaves do not dance in a light blanket over the ground. Salt air still whispers in a stinging wind, but the trees sing along with a cheerful reply to each gust.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Wooded Path
node.description: The path winds through the trees in a pleasant amble, the further from the sea cliffs, the quieter the churn of ocean and wind. A distant owl hoots incessantly, comparable to the tolling of a soft bell.

The path winds through the trees in a pleasant amble, the further from the sea cliffs, the quieter the loquacious ocean and wind. A bird sings out occasionally, its melody soft and sweet over the rustle of tree branches.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Wooded Path
node.description: The path ends here at a ravine -- like a crack in a glacier, or a deep cleft scar, the ground falls far, far away to a distant bottom. Trees border the path and grow along the gap in a line. The width of the gash is too far to jump, but... perhaps a way can be discovered across it.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Wooded Path
node.description: The trees grow tall here south of the ravine that divides the forest into two halves. Deeper into the woods, large rowans grow along the sloping ground and shade the plentiful shrubs and herbs thriving on the damp leaf-strewn floor.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Wooded Path
node.description: The night air has a fresh coolness to it, and the branches of the trees sway overhead in dancing patterns. Sometimes a branch pops loudly, breaking the deep quiet. Startled, birds singing or creatures rustling in their hidden shelters grow still and alert.

The air has a fresh crispness to it, and the light filters through the trees in dancing patterns. Sometimes a branch pops loudly, breaking the deep quiet. Startled, birds singing or creatures rustling in their hidden shelters grow still and alert.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Wooded Path
node.description: Although the slope of the ground is severe, the narrow path winds along a flattened ridge. Broken twigs on a bush near the trail betray the earlier passage of an explorer or an animal.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Wooded Path
node.description: The path runs past a log building, simple in construction but large enough to hold many gatherers. An old willow tree guards the entrance. The area otherwise looks undisturbed, and without careful observation, the building might well have never been noticed.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Wooded Path
node.description: A stand of towering rowan trees spreads in all directions. The sweet scent of mint and damp earth mingles with composting leaf mould enriching the already thick soil.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Wooded Path
node.description: Young aspens that quiver with each breeze grow in the space beneath the towering rowans. The smaller growth screens and shelters the area from the forest beyond, forming a natural sanctuary.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Wooded Path
node.description: The leaf-covered slope is broken at one point by rocks where the soil has worn away. A single slate beneath it is wet with the splash of spring water that spills from the rocky ground. The patter of water counterpoints the shivering rowan and aspen trees that continue into the distant forest.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Hart Hall
node.description: The high rafters of the hall make the building light and spacious, and the planked floor and walls are smooth from years of use. Boards placed over trestles form a long table down the center of the room, and similar planks line the walls to form bunks for bedding. A fire at one end of the hall burns brightly and warms a pot of stew. At the opposite end, a huge rack of antlers hangs over the doorway.

node.name: Waters of the Cove
node.description: The onslaught of the sea is lessened within the protective borders of the small cove. Black sand embraces the water's edge in sun baked warmth, its heat quenched in the cool caress of the ocean as it glides its foamy, green fingers softly over the shore. Each wave thrusting lightly over the beach steals a precious cargo of sand, yet deposits its own seeds of marine life upon the warm, receptive land.

node.name: Ocean, Near the Cove
node.description: Among sheer towering cliffs is nestled a small sandy cove, a picture of bliss next to the fury of waves breaking on the massive wall of stone. The water, here at the mouth of the cove, bobs gently with the incoming waves, lifting swimmers on its rolling crest. The wide, sweet sea spreads out to the north and west, its swells rising and falling with its own secret rhythms.

node.name: Sea Caves, Tunnel
node.description: The surging of the sea registers as a slight throbbing in the earth and a faint tickle of salt in the air. The sparkling passage leads smoothly and directly away from the trail and ocean into the hard rock of the seaside cliffs.

node.name: Sea Caves, Tunnel
node.description: A slender path winds its way through the chamber, the floor to either side rising gradually until it meets the shallowly arched roof. Short stalactites crowd the ceiling, dripping lonely drops of water. The floor, aside from the worn path, is pocked with puddles and tiny pools. As water drips into the higher pools they overflow their small banks and send a miniature stream running down to the next pool where the event is repeated until the overflow has dribbled out onto the path.

node.name: Crystal Cave
node.description: An outcrop of clear crystals bursts from a red and gold rock formation like the morning sun rising over a forest of stalagmites growing thickly on the cavern floor. Several long stalactites glisten from where they hang on the ceiling, letting fall an occasional drop of water.

node.name: Sea Caves
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

Water cascades down the glistening walls of the large cavern and drips rapidly from many long stalactites. Rivulets of water meander across the uneven floor pooling in a depression near the center of the room. Flecks of mica glimmer like thousands of tiny stars through the thin sheets of water. Numerous stalagmites jab upwards, dribbled spires and towers of some god's languorous dream.

node.name: Sea Caves, Passageway
node.description: The long passageway is cramped and close. Damp walls press in from the sides and great care must be exercised to avoid smashing one's head against the ubiquitous stalactites or barking one's shins on the solid stalagmites which seem to move to get in the way. The glittering speckles imbedded in the rock do very little to banish the stark shadows which grow blackly behind the hanging rock and across the obstacle-studded floor.

node.name: Sea Caves, Passageway
node.description: Warm light glows from a thick vein of clear crystal intersecting the tunnel. The vein must break through the surface somewhere above and reflect the sunlight down. Green metallic tendrils cobweb the walls, forked lightning forms frozen forever in the rock. A small garden of mushrooms has taken up residence on a shelf in the basalt walls which has managed to accumulate enough soil to support the little forest.

node.name: Sea Caves, Large Cavern
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

A damp rock curtain glitters like a grey-green waterfall tumbling down the southern wall of the cavern to spill out across the floor in an uneven carpet of stone. A tall column reaches up into the dark recesses of the stalactite studded ceiling. The sound of water splattering as it hits the floor or a receiving stalagmite echoes weirdly in the chamber.

node.name: Sea Caves, Hot Spring
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

A small pool burbles and steams in the lower end of the small cavern, a wide ledge running about its edge. The walls are smooth and damp, intermittently adorned with a fragile blue and green fungus. A sweet, floral scent wafts from the pool.

node.name: Hot Spring
node.description: The water is almost too hot to endure but is strangely relaxing. The sweet scent of the steam eases the mind, soothing away worries as the rejuvenating water loosens stiff muscles. Each inhalation clears the head with a startling sharpness while inducing a wistful sleepiness.

node.name: Sea Caves
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

No water glistens here. The small room's floor is uneven and covered with rocky dust. Multi-colored layers of rock are exposed in the ceiling where chunks have recently broken off and fallen. Gouges and long scrapes mar one wall where something frantically scratched it some time ago.

node.name: Sea Caves, Cavern
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

A small waterfall pours from the low ceiling into a long shallow pool running along one wall of the elongated chamber. Rocks and stalagmites crowd its banks almost like a dam. Several stalactites reach their long points down nearly to the surface of the pool. Where free from hanging rock formations, the ceiling is covered with a blue-green fungus tinged with yellow. The basalt wall opposite the pool is streaked with yellow, red, and green veins like wisps of colored smoke against a midnight sky.

node.name: Sea Caves, Cavern
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

A ledge skirts its way about this huge chamber. Between the ledge and the wall rises an enormous pile of rubble which has fallen from the ceiling above. The caved in portion of the roof is as flat and round as a plate, and the coloring of the exposed rock forms an image which resembles a large shark. On the other side of the ledge, the floor tilts steeply down among large bits of rock debris, broken stalagmites and shattered stalactites before reaching the far side of the cavern.

node.name: Shrine of Drogor
node.description: The top of the pile of rubble is just out of reach of the ceiling of the chamber, where the image of a ferocious shark is clear on a barren circle of stone. Small bones litter the top of the rubble pile, and offerings lie scattered about the loose stone.

node.name: Sea Caves, Passageway
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

The passage narrows enough that a Gor'Tog would have to squeeze to get its shoulders through, but the ceiling is lost from sight as a crevice extends far above into the darkness. The walls are smooth and straight rather than uneven and rough, as is the case elsewhere in the caverns.

node.name: Sea Caves, Cavern
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

A host of slender stone columns join the ceiling and floor, giving the glimmering cavern the look of a palace ballroom. The ropey veined basalt, glistening with dampness, is a polished marble dance floor. The long stalactites are glittering chandeliers. The elegant stalagmites, clustered in tight knots, are indolent courtiers. A low shelf skirts the northeast side of the chamber, wide and smooth.

node.name: A Nook
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

A large lip of rock forms a pocket in the ceiling within easy reach of the thick stone column. The nook is amazingly dry and feels a bit cooler than the chamber below. A bed of fresh rushes lies invitingly in the rear of the cavity.

node.name: Above the Curtain
node.description: A wide ledge spreads out across the top of the rock curtain. The air feels warm and moist, and it smells slightly of rotten eggs. A few stalactites hang near the edge of the ledge above the curtain, but otherwise the ceiling and floor are barren of rocky growths.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: The air is warm and humid. Beads of water cover the walls and roof, dripping down with inexorable slowness. The rock is patterned with holes and vents of all sizes, and no stalactites or stalagmites grow.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

Odd holes and vents riddle the walls of the passage. Some are too small to poke in a finger, others are larger than a Gor Tog's head. The unusual construction gives the rock a soft, spongy look, but it is quite firm and warm to the touch.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!
Steam gushes into the small chamber from several flues in the walls and floor. Some of the dense clouds escape through small shafts in the ceiling, leaving a light mist blanketing the room.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

The walls have the oozy appearance of mud, piling in soft-looking folds towards the floor. Several fist-sized holes line the top of the walls around the chamber, shooting gouts of steam and spitting out hot mud. Wisps of steam linger about the walls and floor in smoky tendrils.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: Sharp crystals sprout all about the chamber. Black, clear, crimson, and azure spikes thrust up to snag the unwary. Rather than sparkling beautifully, the crystals radiate a dim, unhealthy green glow. Steam swirls sluggishly around the room of the cavern, shrouding some crystals in a thin veil.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

The walls of the small chamber are oddly shaped with bulges and strange eruptions in the rock. The ceiling bows down in the center as if tired of holding up the tons of rock overhead. Tiny holes riddle the undulated floor of the chamber. The air is thick and hot with a halo of steam floating around the edges of the ceiling.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

The tunnel comes to an end in a small chamber, the floor sinking down to a narrow shaft in the floor. Gurgling sounds echo up the shaft, and geysers of steam blast intermittently from the hole. Above the pit, the ceiling is blasted smooth. Water condensation runs down the pock-marked walls from the ceiling.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!
The jagged entrance opens into a smooth black-glass oval. The surface is nearly unmarred, only minor blemishes interrupt the dark reflective walls.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

The uneven floor and bulging walls of the moderately sized chamber are pocked with eerie dark mouths, vents, wells, and holes. Some of the orifices emit tendrils of hot steam, other release nauseous fumes, a very few intermittently burp out scalding water. The smells and sounds are sickeningly remniscent of a sour stomach.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: Thick clouds of steam make for terrible visibility in the narrow passageway. Hot air blows through the cramped confines, tugging at loose articles of clothing and nearly blistering the skin.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: The large cavern is honeycombed with vents and fissures of all sizes. One would need to step carefully to avoid turning an ankle on the uneven and pit-strewn floor. A loud hissing noise fills the room. Steam billows from several sunken orifices about the chamber, and the walls sweat heavily. A glassy-black basalt outcropping gleams in the center of the room.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: Small fissures split the floor and walls, allowing blasts of hot air and steam to shoot up from somewhere below. The air is heavy with the stench of rotting eggs and has a sharp quality which makes eyes water and heads pound. Beads of water drip down the slick green walls.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: A large puddle of muddy water burbles slowly in the lower portion of the small chamber. A couple of stalactites drip sadly into the puddle, looking as if they are about to melt away. The floor has a treacherous, slimy feel to it and the walls and ceiling glisten damply. In the wall behind the pool of muck is a small hole.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: Three strange mounds rise from the floor of the small cavern. An ash-grey mud burbles out of one of the mounds, and the other two belch out putrid smelling fumes and steam. The vents and holes in the wall are all very small, giving the appearance that the tunnel is covered with a huge mud dauber's nest. Jets of steam spray occasionally from the holes.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

The passage is blocked by an old cave-in -- tons of rock cut off movement into a smaller side passage. Steady streams of hot steam billow from several chinks around the edges of the rock pile. The vents in the wall are all very small, giving the appearance that the tunnel is covered with a huge mud dauber's nest. Jets of steam spray occasionally from the holes.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

Glassy basalt glitters darkly on the walls, ceiling, and floor. All surfaces have a peculiar scalloped appearance, the small depressions varying between smooth and glassy or rough and pitted. The small ridges are sharp and jagged. A fall or misstep would likely rend flesh from the unlucky fumbler.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: A black tarry substance coats the walls of the miserably horrid-smelling dead end. A thick crack in the floor, crusted with black scabrous material, releases foul emissions into the air. The vents in the wall are all very small, giving the appearance that the tunnel is covered with a huge mud dauber's nest. Jets of steam spray occasionally from the holes.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: The passageway ends at a deep pit which belches forth great clouds of steam and scalding water. The heat is almost unbearable. The vents in the wall are all very small, giving the appearance that the tunnel is covered with a huge mud dauber's nest. Jets of steam spray occasionally from the holes.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

Wisps of steam rise from the holes and pits in the walls. The air is hot, muggy, and foul smelling, making breathing difficult. A roiling cloud of steam churns against the high roof of the wide chamber.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

The tunnel dwindles and separates into three large vents which sink into the rocky floor. The vents in the wall are all very small, giving the appearance that the tunnel is covered with a huge mud dauber's nest. Jets of steam spray occasionally from the holes.

node.name: Steam Vents
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

The tunnel comes to a gradual end here, the passage diameter narrowing abrupty to a small cone with a dark hole at its end. The vents in the wall are all very small, giving the appearance that the tunnel is covered with a huge mud dauber's nest. Jets of steam spray occasionally from the holes.

node.name: Sea Caves, Crevice
node.description: The top of the crevice ends at a slender opening in the wall. A faint breath of warm air caresses the flesh on its way up the natural chimney. The walls and ceiling are much drier and the air less humid than down below.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

A huge flat slab of rock serves as a floor in this shaft, ending at a dark slot-like opening splitting the north wall horizontally. The low ceiling and walls are likewise even and flat, although the texture is rough to the touch. A fine grit of pulverized rock is scattered across the peculiar chamber.

node.name: Upper Caverns
