node.description: The small dome-shaped chamber is unremarkable except for the smoothness of its surfaces. The floor is even and level with only a light coating of rock dust. The walls slope gently inward and upward to the apex of the hemisphere of black stone.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: Passages lead out of the large chamber like spokes from the hub of a wagon wheel. Dust and rubble cover the floor in cluttered disarray. The ceiling is lost behind many layers of webbing, old and new, as if to hold back the falling stone of the roof. A small cairn stands in the center of the room.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: A thick black ichor creeps down the southern wall of the chamber from a thin crack where the smooth wall slab meets the rough rock of the ceiling. The excretion has built up at the base of the wall and solidified into a scabrous crust. Remarkably, the room is free of the ubiquitous dust and rubble encountered elsewhere.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: Sloping steeply down to the northeast, the floor is pocked with numerous pits and festooned with fallen rock. The extreme southwest end of the room is flat and even for a couple of paces before the ground begins its descent. A couple of out-of-place boulders are worn down and polished on their tops.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: The upper reaches of the chamber are cloaked in deep shadows. Strewn among the unusually large stones and rubble are a litter of cracked bones and other less savory detritus of death. One wall is cloven with an ominous crack running from the floor up into the darkness above. Many smaller spidery lines fork off from the main split.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

A deep crevice splits the cavern in the east. A narrow bridge of stone arches over the abyss to a small landing. The sound of running water echoes loudly through the chamber, reverberating off the high ceiling. Heaps of rubble litter the expansive floor.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: A large clump of webbing obscures and fills a man-sized nook in one wall. Crisscrossing the high ceiling is a multitude of webs. Clouds of fine dust sift down occasionally through the thick strands with a dry rasping rustle.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: The intersecting tunnels form a small chamber only a few paces across. The foot of one of the corner walls forms a low shelf worn smooth by use. The rubble and loose stones in the area are swept aside forming a low ring of debris which passes in front of the passage openings -- a formidable barrier to marauding mice, but naught else.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

Columns of stone sprout from the floor and tower up into the web-veiled reaches of the high ceiling. Nine of the mammoth shafts connect floor and ceiling like living fibers stretching between rent flesh. The cavern is easily fifty paces across at its widest point and at least half as high. Ropes of webbing connect the upper reaches of the pillars in intricate patterns which shift and glimmer with each vibration.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: A disturbingly large pair of disembodied chelicerae lies haphazardly against a wall. Poking out from beneath a large rock fall are several long slivers of chitinous plate. Trailers of aged webbing dangle in silver-grey patches from the walls and ceiling.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

Thick gouges evidence an effort to widen the narrow passage here. Knobs of rock protrude from the irregular walls and thrust into the room to crowd the small space. Dust and flakes of rock litter the ground, crunching sharply when trod upon.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: A dark cut slices through one wall of the chamber running from a gaping hole in the ceiling down through a narrow slot in the floor. A thin stream of water runs along the channel, falling through the hole from somewhere above only to disappear into the rocky earth. The gurgling sound of running water is a pleasant diversion from the unnatural silence of these dry caverns.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: A thin coat of ashen dust covers everything in the wide cavern. Strange scuffling marks are etched in the dust as if someone tried sweeping the room with the wrong end of a broom. Thick webs shroud the roof of the chamber from view, glinting the same silvery-greyness as the fine layer of grit below.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: The misshapen ceiling hangs down in several banded layers. Parts of the great rock plates have fallen, leaving black gaps like missing teeth grinning down from above. Piles of rubble lie in chaotic disarray beneath the gaping holes. At infrequent intervals, fountains of dust rain down from the pits and scatter on the rocks below.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

The floor lies like a rumpled blanket in untidy folds of rock and makes for precarious footing. Loose stones, pebbles, and dust do not help the matter. A long slab of stone leans tiredly against the wall, forming a small niche beneath.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: The small chamber is little more than a widening of the connecting passages. A web of cracks spreads across the otherwise flat and featureless floor. The ceiling is also afflicted with cracks, and wide slates of rock appear on the verge of releasing their tenuous grip and dashing to pieces below.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: A long tube has been cut into the rock with great force. The rounded walls are rough and uneven, but the shaft runs in a nearly perfect straight line, a testament to the power of the earth. Shards of mica sparkle in the dark surfaces of the stone. Looking down the tunnel is like gazing into a well of stars.

node.name: Lofty Perch
node.description: A small ledge juts from the side of the column near the ceiling, just wide enough to stand on comfortably. Instead of walls, the ledge is ringed by the complex webs built all about the upper portion of the cavern.

node.name: Upper Caverns, On the Column
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

The ledge curls its way up and around the wide column. Thick strands of silk, anchored to the sturdy stone, create difficult obstacles. Several planes of webbing stretch across the upper reaches of the high cavern, providing easy access to all areas by whatever creature fashioned them.

node.name: Upper Caverns, On the Column
node.description: The ledge curls its way up and around the wide column. A vast network of thick webbing spans the upper reaches of the high cavern. Anchored on the stone column, stalactites, and the rock walls, the strands create easy access paths for the creatures dwelling therein.

node.name: Upper Caverns, On the Column
node.description: The ledge curls its way up and around the wide column. Thick strands of silk, anchored to the sturdy stone, create difficult obstacles. Several planes of webbing stretch across the upper reaches of the high cavern, providing easy access to all areas by whatever creature fashioned them.

node.name: Upper Caverns, On the Column
node.description: The ledge curls its way up and around the thick stone column. Enormous webs cast their strong silken strands across the upper reaches of the cavern, connecting pillar to wall to stalactite in a dazzling pattern of intersecting and concentric silver lines.

node.name: Upper Caverns, On the Column
node.description: The ledge curls its way up and around the rock column. Long, thick silk strands sweep across the upper reaches of the chamber, shimmering silver rays as the threads stir in the dim reaches of the cave. Above, the ceiling is visible through a few more layers of webbing.

node.name: Upper Caverns, On the Column
node.description: The ledge curls its way up and around the wide column. A vast network of webs fans across the upper reaches of the cavern, glistening damply from water caught falling from small stalactites above. Only a sparse layer of thick grey strands spans the space between this ledge and the roof of the high chamber.

node.name: Upper Caverns, Top of the Column
node.description: The narrow ledge ends near the rough ceiling of the huge cavern. A single horizontal plane of webbing stretches across the area below the roof at the level of the ledge. The many layers filling the nether region create the impression of clouds or fog floating below. Nearly out of reach, where the thick column joins the vaulted ceiling, is a faintly illuminated, rough hole.

node.name: Wide Cavern
node.description: Very faint illumination is provided by a flaking patch of glowing fungus clinging to a fallen rock. An enormous cavern spreads out of sight into the darkness, stony floor and soaring walls fading into the unlit areas beyond. Nearly hidden behind some crumbling stalagmites, a narrow opening sinks into the floor near the wall of the wide cavern. A huge stalagmite and stalactite pair occupy the center of the chamber.

node.name: Wide Cavern
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

A pile of rubble litters the area where a falling stalactite or roof plate has shattered on the ground. The walls at this end of the long cavern are smooth and dry. Silver-grey dust coats everything in a soft film.

node.name: Wide Cavern
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

Smokey quartz and fool's gold gleam from a multitude of small outcrops in an ancient rock curtain draped down the wall. Like dripping candle wax, the sediment crawled down the wall millenia ago and solidified in odd lumps and long streams, even pooling on the floor in a thick, rippled mass of stone.

node.name: Wide Cavern
node.description: Luminous lichens grow on the rocks, stalagmites and walls, providing a dim yellow glow. In the shadows of a pile of rubble, a narrow hole cuts down into the earth, its smooth sides providing little purchase.

node.name: Wide Cavern
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

Occupying this dark corner of the huge chamber is a heaping stack of bones. Small insects skitter in and over the gleaming white remains. The sweet scent of decay tickles the nose faintly in the otherwise dank air.

node.name: Wide Cavern
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

Numerous small stalagmites crowd the space between the base of the great fang in the center of the chamber and the jagged wall of the cavern. The floor is dry and dusty, the thick layers of webbing strewn across the upper cavern catching any water droplets which might have fallen from stalactites hidden above.

node.name: Wide Cavern
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!
Puddles of dust dot the uneven floor. Bits of fractured stone lie scattered about the area. Carved into the wall of the chamber is a skeletal fish.

node.name: Wide Cavern
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

Blanketing the area is a thick carpet of fine-textured black pumice. A few short stalagmites poke up through the layer of powder. The huge, echoing chamber expands to the north and west where an awe-inspiring paired stalactite and stalagmite reach towards each other in a much awaited embrace.

node.name: Wide Cavern, The Fangs
node.description: A gigantic stalagmite erupts from the floor, reaching high up towards the point of an equally massive stalactite. Hanging from the web-shrouded ceiling, the stalactite is an awesome reflection of the lower fang on a silvery pond of silk.

node.name: The Fangs, The Pinnacle
node.description: The irregular surface provides many tiny ledges and hand holds near the tip of the stalagmite. Only a few feet above, a drop of water slowly forms at the slender tip of the fang, gradually growing in size until gravity finally wrests it away to fall upon the rock below.

node.name: The Chimney
node.description: A split in the rock provides a thin lip of stone on which to rest above the dark hole descending below. The narrow chimney rises steeply above, smooth and barren of handholds. The crumbling remains of glowing lichens on the wall provide poor illumination to the cramped spot.

node.name: The Chimney
node.description: A split in the rock provides a thin lip of stone on which to rest above the dark hole descending below. The narrow chimney rises steeply above, smooth and barren of handholds. Weak light from far above drives back the nearly palpable darkness.

node.name: The Chimney
node.description: A slight change of the shaft's orientation provides a thin ledge of stone on which to rest above the dark hole descending below. The narrow chimney rises straight up above, smooth and barren of handholds. The barest trickle of light reaches down from what seems an infinite distance above, providing just enough illumination to question the darkness.

node.name: The Chimney
node.description: A split in the rock provides a thin lip of stone on which to rest above the dark hole descending below. The narrow chimney rises straight up above, smooth and barren of handholds. The darkness thickens like a shroud. The memory of light gleaming within provides more sight than the pale wraith of illumination above.

node.name: The Chimney
node.description: A slight change of the shaft's orientation provides a thin ledge of stone on which to rest above the dark hole descending below. The narrow chimney rises steeply above, smooth and barren of handholds. A light so faint it can only be called such in comparison to the dark below illuminates the area, its source unidentifiable.

node.name: Small Cavern
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

The walls and floor of the chamber are smooth with barely a chisel mark to betray the skilled hand of whatever worked the stone. Overhead, however, the walls curve to the domed ceiling in the usual rough way of caverns. A narrow hole, chimney-like bores its way out through the roof.

node.name: Small Cavern
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

The walls and floor of the chamber are smooth with barely a chisel mark to betray the skilled hand of whatever worked the stone. Overhead, however, the walls curve to the domed ceiling in the usual rough way of caverns. A smooth-walled alcove, slightly larger than a burly dwarf, cuts into the wall.

node.name: Small Cavern
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

The walls and floor of the chamber are smooth with barely a chisel mark to betray the skilled hand of whatever worked the stone. Overhead, however, the walls curve to the domed ceiling in the usual rough way of caverns. Slicing out of the east wall is a small passageway.

node.name: Small Cavern
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

The walls and floor of the chamber are smooth with barely a chisel mark to betray the skilled hand of whatever worked the stone. Overhead, however, the walls curve to the domed ceiling in the usual rough way of caverns. A wide ledge of stone, cluttered with shards of pottery and ceramics, juts from the wall.

node.name: Narrow Passage
node.description: The entire passage is finely cut through the black rock, though it is a bit narrow for 'Togs. It is impossible to tell where chisel may have touched stone in its creation.

node.name: The Rift
node.description: A narrow passage ends at a tall crevice which runs north and south through the cavern. A ledge, wide enough for safety, protrudes into the rift and overhangs the deep gash. The sound of rushing water reverberates through the space.

node.name: Underground River
node.description: A swift river blasts through the narrow chasm, roiling madly in its stoney bed. Glowing lichens growing on the high walls cast a dim illumination on the raging torrent. High above, a wide ledge protrudes from the wall, hanging out over the river.

node.name: Underground River
node.description: Strong jets of water from underground streams emptying into the river below the surface cause powerful swirls and chop. The deep waters move swiftly between the sheer walls of the high crevice. Glowing lichens cast their dim illumination on the river below.

node.name: Underground Streams
node.description: Glowing lichens, high above, cast a dim illumination on the gushing streams below. Water cascades in frothy veils and powerful sprays from large holes in the sides of the fissure. The torrent swells to several feet in depth, churning mightily as it tumbles away.

node.name: Underground Streams, Source
node.description: Hundreds of fountains of water pour from holes in the rock walls at the end of the crevice. The water gathers in an ankle deep pool before rushing away to the north. Glowing lichens, high above, cast a dim illumination on the streams below.

node.name: Underground River
node.description: A swift river blasts through the narrow chasm, roiling madly in its stoney bed. Glowing lichens growing on the high walls cast a dim illumination on the raging torrent.

node.name: Underground River
node.description: A swift river blasts through the narrow chasm, roiling madly in its stoney bed. Glowing lichens growing on the high walls cast a dim illumination on the raging torrent.

node.name: Underground River
node.description: The crevice comes to an abrupt end, but the river punches through the rock, rushing noisily through a wide opening in the wall of stone.

node.name: Underground River, Underwater
node.description: A torrent of water rushes through the wide tunnel dragging all along with it. Scouring the rock as it goes, the river wears down the stone, occasionally tearing off a chunk and pushing it along in the flood.

node.name: Underground River, Underwater
node.description: A torrent of water rushes through the wide tunnel dragging all along with it. Scouring the rock as it goes, the river wears down the stone, occasionally tearing off a chunk and pushing it along in the flood.

node.name: Underground River, Underwater
node.description: A torrent of water rushes through the wide tunnel dragging all along with it. Scouring the rock as it goes, the river wears down the stone, occasionally tearing off a chunk and pushing it along in the flood.

node.name: Underground River, Underwater
node.description: A torrent of water rushes through the wide tunnel dragging all along with it. Scouring the rock as it goes, the river wears down the stone, occasionally tearing off a chunk and pushing it along in the flood.

node.name: Underground River, Underwater
node.description: A torrent of water rushes through the wide tunnel dragging all along with it. Scouring the rock as it goes, the river wears down the stone, occasionally tearing off a chunk and pushing it along in the flood.

node.name: Chasm River
node.description: The deep water rushes wildly between the craggy walls rising to either side. High above, the bridge arches over the chasm, its underside dimly lit. Water splashes high up the wall as it tumbles through, bashing against the rough stone. Debris in the water, propelled by the swift current, strikes swimmers with great force. Water gushes from a low opening in the south wall. A strange luminescence glows faintly from under the water.

node.name: Chasm River
node.description: The deep water rushes wildly between the craggy walls rising to either side. High above, the bridge arches over the chasm, its underside dimly lit. Water splashes high up the wall as it tumbles through, bashing against the rough stone. Debris in the water, propelled by the swift current, strikes swimmers with great force. A strange luminescence glows faintly from under the water.

node.name: Chasm River
node.description: The deep water rushes wildly between the craggy walls rising to either side. High above, the bridge arches over the chasm, its underside dimly lit. Water splashes high up the wall as it tumbles through, bashing against the rough stone. Debris in the water, propelled by the swift current, strikes swimmers with great force. The swirling waters drain out through a low tunnel in the wall. A strange luminescence glows faintly from under the water.

node.name: Upper Caverns
node.description: It's pitch dark and you can't see a thing!

node.name: Underground River, Underwater
node.description: A torrent of water rushes through the wide tunnel dragging all along with it. Scouring the rock as it goes, the river wears down the stone, occasionally tearing off a chunk and pushing it along in the flood.

node.name: Underground River, Underwater
node.description: A torrent of water rushes through the wide tunnel dragging all along with it. Scouring the rock as it goes, the river wears down the stone, occasionally tearing off a chunk and pushing it along in the flood.

node.name: Underground River, Underwater
node.description: A torrent of water rushes through the wide tunnel dragging all along with it. Scouring the rock as it goes, the river wears down the stone, occasionally tearing off a chunk and pushing it along in the flood.

node.name: Underground River, Underwater
node.description: A torrent of water rushes through the wide tunnel dragging all along with it. Scouring the rock as it goes, the river wears down the stone, occasionally tearing off a chunk and pushing it along in the flood.

node.name: Underground River, Underwater
node.description: A torrent of water rushes through the wide tunnel dragging all along with it. Scouring the rock as it goes, the river wears down the stone, occasionally tearing off a chunk and pushing it along in the flood.

node.name: Underground River, Underwater
node.description: A torrent of water rushes through the wide tunnel dragging all along with it. Scouring the rock as it goes, the river wears down the stone, occasionally tearing off a chunk and pushing it along in the flood.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Kregkeirel Stable
node.description: Whitewashed wooden stalls line the room, customized to suit the needs of the native creatures of Surlaenis. Long-eared and camel-faced, the kregkeirels peek over their pens with bored interest, using their long necks to get a good view of the hay-filled surroundings. Along one wall is a row of panniers, large woven baskets shaped to fit comfortably on the back of the beasts. Stablehands come and go as they see to their work, sometimes stopping to offer the beasts an affectionate pat.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Chamber
node.description: Soft, bluish light pulses from the walls of this chamber, a vein of precious anloral. The air is cool and fresh, not a trace of the life-sucking cold seeping through the passageways or stone. The walls are sheer and smooth, soaring high overhead to merge into a boundless glow.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Beside Shadaer Jama
node.description: In an overgrown indentation not far from the road, the ground is covered with shattered rock and fallen pebbles. Within one crevice, water bubbles up from an underground spring and tumbles over the stones in a gushing gargle of swift water as it heads down the steep slope below.

node.name: Builder's Warehouse, Interior
node.description: An entry area to the warehouse lies just inside the door. As the space stretches away from the docks, rice paper screens partition it into private sections that shopkeepers rent to display their wares. Fluttering overhead, a paper mobile hangs out of reach and dances wildly in the breeze each time the door opens and closes.

node.name: Builder's Warehouse, Sectioned Corridor
node.description: The screens form a passageway to move deeper into the warehouse. A sisal runner covering the wood planked floor and the scent of burning sandalwood lends warmth and comfort to the practical space. The muted shouts of workers on the dock drift into the interior through partly-open windows high overhead.

node.name: Builder's Warehouse, Sectioned Corridor
node.description: Several open screens lead into various sections providing wares for the homeowner or builder. From somewhere in the farthest reaches comes the soft cry of an infant and his mother's singing coos to calm him as she works.

node.name: Smoque's Screens
node.description: Translucent ricepaper screens in neutral and pastel colors are on display along the walls of the shop. A sliding arrangement near the door allows the purchaser to judge the colors in the light when selecting furnishings for their home.

node.name: Where There's Smoque, There's Fyere!
node.description: Fires burn in small braziers and stoves, each carefully screened to protect the ricepaper screens which form the walls of the shop. Designed to sit upon the floor, the low braziers provide a surprising amount of warmth for their size.

node.name: Thymes' Tables
node.description: The fragrance of freshly carved sandalwood doesn't quite mask the sharper smells of the lacquer used to provide the glossy finish so popular on the island. An assortment of tables and desks are on display, providing the homeowner with a good selection of both traditional and modern styles. From the abstract shesegri design of the meditation table to the more representative floral images on the rose and lotus tables, the shop bespeaks fine craftsmanship and careful attention to detail.

node.name: The Lap of Luxury
node.description: Pale gold ricepaper screens enclose the small shop. Within, piles of cushions in various fabrics and colors are scattered upon the floor. Traditionally, local homes use these cushions in place of the mainlander's chairs to offer a comfortable place for guests to sit or recline while eating dinner at low tables.

node.name: Fenwycke's Floormats
node.description: Samples of the local floormats -- woven reed or grass floor matting which conceal the floor of a home -- are on display along the walls of the shop. The shopkeeper, Fenwycke, plies his trade as he works, waiting for customers to make their decisions.

node.name: Tredwynne's Bedding
node.description: Translucent ricepaper screens line the walls of the shop, the austerity complementing the black stone columns as well as the neutral color of the woven reed floormat. Against the understated neutrality of the background decor, the sleeping mats on display around the shop provide bright splashes of color.

node.name: Tredwynne's Bed Linens
node.description: Stacks of quilts and blankets fill the cabinets which line the shop, leaving little room for the pillows and other objects on display. Tredwynne's prides itself on offering a complete line of bedding and accessories for the home.

node.name: A Room With A View
node.description: Thin metal chains hang from the ceiling, supporting metal-framed frosted and stained glass windows. The windows are more decorative than functional, keeping insects out and allowing light to filter through the cut glass surfaces.

node.name: Denison's Pub, Common Room
node.description: A long bar curves around the eastern end of the room, the imposing figure of Denison guarding the casks along the back wall. Several wooden tables surrounded by rickety chairs in various states of repair crowd the small room in front of the door. Along the north wall are a couple of slightly more private, and less clean, booths. The dingy interior is lit by a couple lanterns hanging from support beams burning smelly lamp oil and filling the room with a foul smoke.

A long bar curves around the eastern end of the room, the imposing figure of Denison guarding the casks along the back wall. Several wooden tables surrounded by rickety chairs in various states of repair crowd the small room in front of the door. Along the north wall are a couple of slightly more private, and less clean, booths. The dingy interior is lit by the sunlight streaming in the broken windows on either side of the entryway.

node.name: Denison's Pub, Stairwell
node.description: A flight of stone stairs leading up to the second floor takes up most of the space in this small room. A narrow hallway leads off to the west. A little used broom and dustpan sit in a dark corner next to the steps.

node.name: Denison's Pub, Upper Stairwell
node.description: A narrow hallway leads away from the stairs and into the dark recesses of the pub. A grimy window allows a little light to illuminate the steps and hallway. An occasional burst of laughter erupts from the common room, and a low buzz of conversation murmurs in the hallway.

node.name: Denison's Pub, Narrow Hallway
node.description: A dim stairwell lies at one end of the hallway. The passage takes a sharp turn west away from the stairwell and comes to a dark dead end. An ebony door on the north wall and a darkly stained walnut door directly across from it are barely discernable in the poor light. Soot and debris litter the hallway, loose trash rustling underfoot.

node.name: Denison's Pub, A Back Room
node.description: Well-crafted tapestries cover the walls, and a thick rug carpets the floor. An intricately carved liquor cabinet stands against one wall. Plush cushions issue a tempting invitation, and a low hammock, upheld by two granite statues of dancing maidens, swings near the wall opposite the door. The ceiling is also draped with small tapestries to keep out drafts and absorb leaks.

node.name: Denison's Pub, Dark Passage
node.description: A single door opens into this short, unlit hallway. Dim light filters in from an opening at the end of the hallway, enough to see the walls have been paneled and a thick red carpet put down on the floor.

node.name: Denison's Pub, Back Hallway
node.description: The narrow passage runs in a straight line along the back of the pub, a smaller hallway branching off in the middle. A pair of small grimy windows high in the east wall allow the barest bit of light to illuminate the refuse-scattered way. The back stair is littered with cast off clothing, broken plates, and spilled food and drink, contributing a memorable scent to the location.

node.name: Denison's Pub, Curtain Room
node.description: Thick red velvet curtains hang from a wooden beam, shrouding a makeshift bed of heaped cushions and furs in near darkness. A burning wick floating in a bowl of lamp oil provides meager illumination from its perch on a low table opposite the bed. Woven mats cover the floor and prove to be remarkably comfortable.

node.name: Denison's Pub, Upper Chamber
node.description: Three thin windows covered in grease paper cast a dim glow over the room. Variously sized tables and chairs crowd the close chamber, creating a veritable obstacle course. A badly torn fishing net covers one whole wall, gathering dust even as it slowly rots away. Herds of dust bunnies stampede across the bare wood floor when the door opens and stirs the thick air.

node.name: Denison's Pub, Sitting Room
node.description: A wide hearth occupies the south wall with its stone hulk. Scattered about the room are pairs, trios, and larger groups of chairs arranged for comfortable dialog, intimate discussions, or group arguments. A colorful Therengian carpet covers the floor, underlying several fine tables which stand available to hold drinks and food. Shiny brass lamps burn at regular intervals around the walls, providing a sweet scent and little smoke.

node.name: Denison's Pub, Table Room
node.description: A long oak table, the finest piece of furniture in the pub, demands most of the space in the room. A slew of mismatched chairs encircle the table, eating up the remaining space. Two rusty iron lamps spread their glow from atop the table.

node.name: Denison's Pub, Rattan Room
node.description: The deteriorating floorboards are mostly covered with an elaborate patchwork of threadbare throw rugs. A frame of curved rattan supports a thick mattress clothed with linen sheets which may have once been white. Pushed into a dim corner of the room is a roomy circular chair, also of rattan. Above a tarnished brass lamp is a black triangle of soot, dirtying the fading white wash.

node.name: Denison's Pub, Closet
node.description: Several shelves hold stacks of folded sheets, towels, spare bar glasses, lamps, casks of oil and other supplies a pub might need.

node.name: Denison's Pub, Cellar
node.description: The cellar is packed with beer barrels, wine casks, tuns, and crates of staples and foodstuffs. Narrow aisles pass between the high stacks. A rack supports several tapped barrels and kegs for the lesser ordered beverages carried by the pub. Bags of flour, sugar, and other dry ingredients are piled on shelves and atop tuns to prevent the damp floor from damaging them. It is a wonder Denison or his staff can find anything in the clutter.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Willowbee's Pelts and Spinners
node.description: Crates of furs and piles of tightly wrapped spinnerets are stacked in the room, many of them tagged with the names of far away places -- the destinations where the furs are bound. A spindly male elf, Willowbee himself, is often seen bustling around the shop and preparing orders while keeping an eye on the door for hunters, trappers, and traders to bring him business.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Sheds and Shacks
node.description: The small building is crammed with a variety of new and used building materials, but most of it looks scavenged at best. There is hardly room to turn around, much less closely examine anything, but the merchant is delighted to see any potential customer and eagerly awaits an order.

node.name: The Traders' Guild, Grand Foyer
node.description: Richly veneered cherrywood beams climb the polished marble walls, peaking to form the arch of the high vaulted glass ceiling. Evening light casts a dim glow upon the stone floors, lengthening the shadows beneath a wide deobar staircase that leads to an open hallway above. The sounds of thrifty commerce seem enhanced in the echo -- every footstep, every jingle of coin and every barter from the nearby Exchange fill the air with promises of exciting ventures and profitable returns.

Richly veneered cherrywood beams climb the polished marble walls, peaking to form the arch of the high vaulted glass ceiling. Light filters down and warms the cold stone floors, casting shadows beneath a wide deobar staircase that leads to an open hallway above. The sounds of thrifty commerce seem enhanced by the echo -- every footstep, every jingle of coin and every barter from the nearby Exchange fill the air with promises of exciting ventures and profitable returns.

node.name: The Traders' Guild, Surlaenis Customs Exchange
node.description: Like a great melting pot of chaos and order, the Exchange is constantly filled with traders and dock workers, hauling in imports and trying to strike up profitable deals with other merchants. Numbers are tossed through the air, handshakes are made, and crates are bought and sold -- all for the neverending, energizing grind of trying to seize the perfect bargain.

node.name: The Traders' Guild, Private Dock
node.description: Crates and barrels line the docks, all properly tied and marked as they wait for shipment abroad. Dockhands and guild clerks mill about on the dock as they unload, sort and load -- their heavy boots making a rhythmic plodding sound on the wooden surface. Wheeled carts are filled with goods and readied for the short trek up the ramp and into the Traders' Guild.

node.name: The Trader's Guild, Lower Deck
node.description: Shadowed by the decks above and hanging over the deep, rolling ocean, the lower deck provides a delightful view of the sea. Every now and then the tumbling waves crash against the dock and spray the deck with water, leaving it constantly damp and glistening. Deck chairs have been lined up between the doors on the south side of the guildhall, keeping them fairly dry for those wishing to relax and enjoy the salty air.

node.name: The Traders' Guild, Surlaenis Shipping Office
node.description: Stacked crates fill the office, some of them towering up to the ceiling, each one clearly tagged and marked with such precision that only a third of the crates marked topside are upside down. Nearly buried in the room is a small stand, filled with ship schedules and paperwork haphazardly stacked in chaotic piles in attempt to keep the area tidy.

node.name: The Trader's Guild, Middle Deck
node.description: Sandwiched between the other decks, the Middle Deck provides a sheltered view of the sea, far above the rolling waves. Footsteps can often be heard from above and below, along with the occasional squeaking of the rope-service. Tantalizing aromas of hot, freshly cooked meals fill the air any time the box to the rope-service passes by.

node.name: The Trader's Guild, Upper Deck
node.description: The upper deck provides an unobstructed view of the sun and the sea. Deck chairs provide residents with a comfortable vantage point from which they can take in the sun or enjoy the view while sipping drinks delivered by the rope-service. To the north above the Mariner's Deck and surrounded by the rough, wooden awning of the roof is a lone balcony, where a narrow door, much like one designed for a ship, has been shut tight against unwanted visitors brave enough to try to get in via that route.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Kregkeirel Stable
node.description: Whitewashed wooden stalls line the room, customized to suit the needs of the native creatures of Surlaenis. Long-eared and camel-faced, the kregkeirels peek over their pens with bored interest, using their long necks to get a good view of the hay-filled surroundings. Along one wall is a row of panniers, large woven baskets shaped to fit comfortably on the back of the beasts. Stablehands come and go as they see to their work, sometimes stopping to offer the beasts an affectionate pat.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Barn
node.description: Weathered grey boards muffle the ever-present sound of the sea just over the dunes to the west, creating a cozy and secure haven from the elements. From their individual stalls come the faint sounds of horses stamping their hooves or swishing their tails at a bothersome fly. In one corner is a holding pen with several horses and ponies offered for sale.

node.name: Aesry Surlaenis'a, Barn
node.description: Carefully maintained horse stalls line both sides of a broad, straw-covered passage. Pungent smells rise around you -- the sweetness of hay, the earthiness of manure, leather, oil, and sweat. Bales of fresh straw are stacked along the far wall, ready for use.

node.name: Tack and Feed Room
node.description: Stableman Sy'ilar stands behind a rough counter formed by a broad board laid across two barrels. Surrounding him are old trunks, boxes, and baskets holding all the many things needed to properly care for a horse, including feed, tack, and grooming tools.

node.name: The Traders' Guild, Hallway
node.description: Separated from the lower foyer by an open wooden rail, the narrow hallway provides an excellent view of the room below -- as well as an acoustical ear into any conversations carelessly spoken under the wide, vaulted ceiling. Open glass doors to the west lead out onto an elevated wooden deck, while a large, finely carved door leads into the only room on the second floor, the guild leader's office.

node.name: The Traders' Guild, Mariners' Deck
node.description: Taking full advantage of the panoramic view of the docks, this finished wooden deck has been constructed upon the lower roof of the Guild Hall, looking out towards the sea. Tables and chairs have been placed about the area, somewhat protected from the elements by a large wooden awning that overhangs the deck. Elderly mariners and traders gather in groups around the tables, boasting of good deals or telling tales of dangers on the high seas as they puff on pipes and gaze down on the lights of the harbor.

Taking full advantage of the panoramic view of the docks, this finished wooden deck has been constructed upon the lower roof of the Guild Hall, looking out towards the sea. Tables and chairs have been placed about the area, somewhat protected from the elements by a large wooden awning that overhangs the deck. Elderly mariners and traders gather in groups around the tables, boasting of good deals or telling tales of dangers on the high seas.

node.name: The Traders' Guild, Seranda's Office
node.description: Memoirs gathered from countless journeys on the high seas are decoratively placed around the room, some clustered on small tables and some hanging along the walls. A low cherrywood desk stands in front of an open window that faces the guild's private dock, providing a view of the activity. Placed beside it is a high-backed wicker chair of local craftsmanship, filled with watersilk cushions and pillows, custom-made to suit the Guild Leader's taste and comfort.

node.name: Ranger Guild, Cave Mouth
node.description: In the mouth of the cave, pale daylight flickers through the dangling roots like faeries at play. An exquisitely carved mahogany case on the eastern wall looks oddly appropriate for the area. Despite the recent furnishings, time marks this rocky shelter by the endless coat of moss that covers the rock surfaces. A few scattered stones protrude from the brown sand underfoot.

node.name: Ranger Guild, Tunnel
node.description: Halfway through the torch-lined tunnel, the ceiling begins to bloat downward, forcing all but the smallest of races to stoop over. Above a small, unattended fire pit, the contents of an iron pot slowly simmer. Gradually the smell of onions, garlic, and some sort of fowl become recognizable, masking the otherwise dank, musty smell of the cave.

node.name: Ranger Guild, Main Area
node.description: The low tunnel opens into a magnificent cathedral of stalagmites and stalactites veiled in a thin mist of moisture. Amplified by the acoustics of the cavern, water droplets and their echoes perform a natural symphony. To the north, a natural formation of rocks bridges the chasm.

node.name: Ranger Guild, Northern Cavern
node.description: Mushrooms and colorful lichen anchor their roots throughout the crystal formations within the walls, which magnify the natural light in this area. Small boulders allow the visitors to sit quietly and enjoy the beauty of the caves, while a natural spring offers the perfect solution to soothe aching bodies.

node.name: Fyne's Fishing Supplies
node.description: Built out over the harbor on stilts, the floor of the shack is pierced in several places by open trap doors, each of which has a rope slung through it. The walls have apparently been built of whatever driftwood washed ashore, and the sky is clearly visible in several spots through the loosely thatched roof. Barrels filled with water are lined against the walls, emitting odors that only a shark could love. On top of the largest barrel is perched a battered catalog.

node.name: Denison's Pub, Bolt Hole
node.description: The small room is obviously designed for hiding persons or objects. Occupants can peer out the door without being seen on this side of the hidden door. The room is sparsely furnished with only a table and a few chairs.

node.name: The Traders' Guild, Kitchen
node.description: Arranged in a fashion much like the galley of a ship, this private kitchen serves not only the private needs of the Guildleader and her staff but also provides the food and menus for the restaurant and rope-service. Crates of goods line the back wall along with dangling dried meats and seasonal fruits, filling the kitchen with a constant, spicy aroma. A chipped cat dish has been placed below the heavy wooden prep table in the center of the room.

node.name: The Halasa Selhin, Main Deck
node.description: After years of varnishing, the main deck of the Halasa Selhin glistens like a becalmed sea. Holding the crisp yards of her mainsail, the mainmast rises skyward to a dizzying height with the sweeping length of the boom spreading her canvas skirt to the wind. Brightly colored pennants flutter from the halyards.
